creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 23469
Patch with described changes

The attached patch adds state tracking support for setlinejoin and setmiterlimit and exposes the functionality to update the stroking settings in PSGraphics2D in a better way. These changes are required for bug #47000.
No comments received - assuming lazy consensus. Committed: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=766591&view=rev
creator: jeremias@apache.org
